prompts.title: Code Review Assistant
prompts.content:
Please review the following code for:

1. **Best Practices & Standards**
   - Coding conventions and style consistency
   - Proper naming conventions
   - Code organization and structure

2. **Security & Performance**
   - Potential security vulnerabilities
   - Performance bottlenecks or inefficiencies
   - Memory leaks or resource management issues

3. **Maintainability & Readability**
   - Code clarity and documentation
   - Complexity reduction opportunities
   - Refactoring suggestions

4. **Testing & Error Handling**
   - Edge cases and error scenarios
   - Test coverage recommendations
   - Exception handling improvements

Provide specific, actionable feedback with code examples where applicable:

```
[PASTE YOUR CODE HERE]
```

prompts.title: Creative Writing Brainstorm
prompts.content:
Help me brainstorm ideas for a creative writing project. I'm looking for:

**Character Development:**
- Unique character concepts with compelling backstories
- Character flaws and growth arcs
- Distinctive voice and personality traits
- Relationships and character dynamics

**Plot & Structure:**
- Engaging opening hooks
- Interesting plot twists and complications
- Satisfying conflict resolution
- Pacing and story structure

**World Building:**
- Compelling settings and atmospheres
- Cultural and social dynamics
- Rules and limitations of the world
- Sensory details and immersion

**Themes & Messages:**
- Universal themes and human experiences
- Symbolic elements and metaphors
- Emotional resonance and impact
- Social commentary opportunities

**Project Details:**
- Genre: [SPECIFY GENRE]
- Target Audience: [SPECIFY AUDIENCE]
- Length: [SHORT STORY/NOVELLA/NOVEL]
- Tone: [SERIOUS/HUMOROUS/DARK/UPLIFTING]
- Setting: [TIME PERIOD/LOCATION]

Please provide 3-5 detailed concepts for each category.

prompts.title: Meeting Summary Template
prompts.content:
Please create a comprehensive meeting summary using the following structure:

# Meeting Summary

## Meeting Details
- **Date:** [DATE]
- **Time:** [START TIME] - [END TIME]
- **Location/Platform:** [LOCATION OR VIDEO PLATFORM]
- **Meeting Type:** [TEAM SYNC/PROJECT REVIEW/PLANNING/OTHER]
- **Facilitator:** [NAME]

## Attendees
**Present:**
- [NAME] - [ROLE]
- [NAME] - [ROLE]

**Absent:**
- [NAME] - [ROLE] (Reason if known)

## Agenda Items Discussed

### 1. [AGENDA ITEM TITLE]
- **Discussion Points:**
  - [KEY POINT 1]
  - [KEY POINT 2]
- **Outcome:** [RESULT/DECISION]

### 2. [AGENDA ITEM TITLE]
- **Discussion Points:**
  - [KEY POINT 1]
  - [KEY POINT 2]
- **Outcome:** [RESULT/DECISION]

## Key Decisions Made
1. [DECISION 1] - Rationale: [WHY]
2. [DECISION 2] - Rationale: [WHY]

## Action Items
| Task | Owner | Due Date | Priority | Status |
|------|-------|----------|----------|--------|
| [TASK DESCRIPTION] | [NAME] | [DATE] | [HIGH/MED/LOW] | [NOT STARTED/IN PROGRESS/COMPLETED] |
| [TASK DESCRIPTION] | [NAME] | [DATE] | [HIGH/MED/LOW] | [NOT STARTED/IN PROGRESS/COMPLETED] |

## Issues & Blockers
- **Issue:** [DESCRIPTION]
  - **Impact:** [HOW IT AFFECTS PROJECT]
  - **Resolution Plan:** [NEXT STEPS]

## Next Steps
1. [IMMEDIATE ACTION]
2. [FOLLOW-UP MEETING/REVIEW]
3. [LONG-TERM PLANNING]

## Next Meeting
- **Date:** [DATE]
- **Agenda Preview:** [MAIN TOPICS]

---
*Summary prepared by: [YOUR NAME]*
*Distribution: [ATTENDEE LIST]*

prompts.title: Email Marketing Campaign Designer
prompts.content:
Create a comprehensive email marketing campaign with the following components:

## Campaign Overview
- **Campaign Name:** [CAMPAIGN NAME]
- **Product/Service:** [WHAT YOU'RE PROMOTING]
- **Target Audience:** [DEMOGRAPHICS/PSYCHOGRAPHICS]
- **Campaign Goal:** [AWARENESS/CONVERSION/RETENTION/OTHER]
- **Success Metrics:** [OPEN RATE/CLICK RATE/CONVERSIONS/REVENUE]

## Subject Line Options
Create 5-7 compelling subject lines:
1. [CURIOSITY-DRIVEN SUBJECT]
2. [BENEFIT-FOCUSED SUBJECT]
3. [URGENCY/SCARCITY SUBJECT]
4. [PERSONALIZED SUBJECT]
5. [QUESTION-BASED SUBJECT]

## Email Content Structure

### Header
- **From Name:** [SENDER NAME]
- **From Email:** [EMAIL ADDRESS]
- **Preheader Text:** [PREVIEW TEXT]

### Opening
- **Personalized Greeting:** Hi [FIRST NAME],
- **Hook/Opening Line:** [ATTENTION-GRABBING OPENER]

### Value Proposition
- **Main Benefit:** [PRIMARY VALUE]
- **Supporting Benefits:**
  - [BENEFIT 1]
  - [BENEFIT 2]
  - [BENEFIT 3]

### Social Proof
- **Testimonial/Review:** "[CUSTOMER QUOTE]" - [CUSTOMER NAME]
- **Statistics:** [IMPRESSIVE NUMBERS/RESULTS]
- **Trust Indicators:** [CERTIFICATIONS/AWARDS/MEDIA MENTIONS]

### Call-to-Action
- **Primary CTA:** [ACTION-ORIENTED BUTTON TEXT]
- **Secondary CTA:** [ALTERNATIVE ACTION]
- **Urgency Element:** [TIME-SENSITIVE OFFER/LIMITED AVAILABILITY]

### Closing
- **Personal Sign-off:** [FRIENDLY CLOSING]
- **Contact Information:** [SUPPORT/CONTACT DETAILS]
- **Unsubscribe Link:** [REQUIRED LEGAL COMPLIANCE]

## Design Guidelines
- **Color Scheme:** [BRAND COLORS]
- **Typography:** [FONT CHOICES]
- **Images:** [PRODUCT SHOTS/LIFESTYLE IMAGES]
- **Mobile Optimization:** [RESPONSIVE DESIGN NOTES]

## A/B Testing Plan
- **Test Variable:** [SUBJECT LINE/CTA/CONTENT/TIMING]
- **Audience Split:** [PERCENTAGE BREAKDOWN]
- **Success Metric:** [PRIMARY MEASUREMENT]

## Follow-up Sequence
1. **Day 3:** [FOLLOW-UP EMAIL CONCEPT]
2. **Day 7:** [SECOND FOLLOW-UP CONCEPT]
3. **Day 14:** [FINAL FOLLOW-UP CONCEPT]

Please customize this template for: [SPECIFIC INDUSTRY/PRODUCT/AUDIENCE]

prompts.title: Research Analysis Framework
prompts.content:
Analyze the following research topic using this comprehensive framework:

# Research Analysis: [TOPIC TITLE]

## 1. Problem Statement & Context

### Core Research Question
- **Primary Question:** [MAIN RESEARCH QUESTION]
- **Sub-questions:**
  - [SUPPORTING QUESTION 1]
  - [SUPPORTING QUESTION 2]
  - [SUPPORTING QUESTION 3]

### Background & Significance
- **Why is this important?** [RELEVANCE AND IMPACT]
- **Current state of knowledge:** [WHAT WE ALREADY KNOW]
- **Knowledge gaps:** [WHAT'S MISSING OR UNCLEAR]
- **Stakeholders affected:** [WHO CARES ABOUT THIS RESEARCH]

## 2. Literature Review & Current State

### Key Sources & Studies
- **Seminal works:** [FOUNDATIONAL RESEARCH]
- **Recent developments:** [LATEST FINDINGS]
- **Conflicting viewpoints:** [AREAS OF DISAGREEMENT]
- **Methodological approaches:** [HOW OTHERS STUDIED THIS]

### Theoretical Framework
- **Relevant theories:** [APPLICABLE THEORETICAL MODELS]
- **Conceptual definitions:** [KEY TERMS AND CONCEPTS]
- **Assumptions:** [UNDERLYING BELIEFS/PREMISES]

## 3. Methodology & Approach

### Research Design
- **Study type:** [QUALITATIVE/QUANTITATIVE/MIXED METHODS]
- **Data collection methods:** [SURVEYS/INTERVIEWS/EXPERIMENTS/OBSERVATION]
- **Sample size & selection:** [WHO/WHAT/HOW MANY]
- **Timeline:** [RESEARCH SCHEDULE]

### Data Sources
- **Primary sources:** [ORIGINAL DATA/DOCUMENTS]
- **Secondary sources:** [EXISTING RESEARCH/DATABASES]
- **Quality criteria:** [HOW TO EVALUATE SOURCE RELIABILITY]

## 4. Key Findings & Analysis

### Major Discoveries
1. **Finding 1:** [DESCRIPTION]
   - **Evidence:** [SUPPORTING DATA]
   - **Significance:** [WHY IT MATTERS]

2. **Finding 2:** [DESCRIPTION]
   - **Evidence:** [SUPPORTING DATA]
   - **Significance:** [WHY IT MATTERS]

### Patterns & Trends
- **Emerging themes:** [RECURRING PATTERNS]
- **Correlations:** [RELATIONSHIPS BETWEEN VARIABLES]
- **Unexpected results:** [SURPRISING FINDINGS]

### Limitations & Constraints
- **Methodological limitations:** [STUDY DESIGN CONSTRAINTS]
- **Data limitations:** [SAMPLE SIZE/QUALITY ISSUES]
- **Scope limitations:** [WHAT WASN'T COVERED]

## 5. Implications & Recommendations

### Practical Applications
- **Immediate actions:** [WHAT CAN BE DONE NOW]
- **Policy implications:** [REGULATORY/GOVERNANCE CHANGES]
- **Industry applications:** [BUSINESS/ORGANIZATIONAL USES]

### Future Research Directions
- **Unanswered questions:** [WHAT STILL NEEDS STUDY]
- **Methodological improvements:** [BETTER WAYS TO STUDY THIS]
- **Interdisciplinary opportunities:** [CROSS-FIELD COLLABORATION]

### Risk Assessment
- **Potential negative consequences:** [WHAT COULD GO WRONG]
- **Mitigation strategies:** [HOW TO MINIMIZE RISKS]
- **Ethical considerations:** [MORAL/ETHICAL IMPLICATIONS]

## 6. Conclusion & Next Steps

### Summary of Key Points
- [MAIN TAKEAWAY 1]
- [MAIN TAKEAWAY 2]
- [MAIN TAKEAWAY 3]

### Recommended Actions
1. **Short-term (0-6 months):** [IMMEDIATE STEPS]
2. **Medium-term (6-18 months):** [DEVELOPMENT PHASE]
3. **Long-term (18+ months):** [IMPLEMENTATION/SCALING]

---

**Research Topic:** [INSERT YOUR SPECIFIC TOPIC HERE]
**Analysis Date:** [TODAY'S DATE]
**Analyst:** [YOUR NAME/ORGANIZATION]

prompts.title: Product Launch Strategy
prompts.content:
Develop a comprehensive product launch strategy using this framework:

# Product Launch Strategy: [PRODUCT NAME]

## Executive Summary
- **Product:** [PRODUCT NAME AND BRIEF DESCRIPTION]
- **Launch Date:** [TARGET LAUNCH DATE]
- **Target Market:** [PRIMARY AUDIENCE]
- **Success Metrics:** [KEY PERFORMANCE INDICATORS]
- **Budget:** [ESTIMATED LAUNCH BUDGET]

## 1. Product Overview

### Product Details
- **Name:** [PRODUCT NAME]
- **Category:** [PRODUCT CATEGORY]
- **Key Features:**
  - [FEATURE 1]
  - [FEATURE 2]
  - [FEATURE 3]
- **Unique Value Proposition:** [WHAT MAKES IT SPECIAL]
- **Pricing Strategy:** [PRICING MODEL AND RATIONALE]

### Competitive Analysis
- **Direct Competitors:** [LIST MAIN COMPETITORS]
- **Competitive Advantages:** [HOW WE'RE BETTER]
- **Market Positioning:** [WHERE WE FIT IN THE MARKET]

## 2. Target Audience Analysis

### Primary Target Segment
- **Demographics:** [AGE, GENDER, INCOME, LOCATION]
- **Psychographics:** [VALUES, INTERESTS, LIFESTYLE]
- **Pain Points:** [PROBLEMS WE SOLVE]
- **Buying Behavior:** [HOW THEY MAKE DECISIONS]

### Secondary Segments
- **Segment 2:** [DESCRIPTION]
- **Segment 3:** [DESCRIPTION]

## 3. Launch Timeline

### Pre-Launch Phase (8-12 weeks before)
- **Week -12:** [ACTIVITY]
- **Week -8:** [ACTIVITY]
- **Week -4:** [ACTIVITY]
- **Week -2:** [ACTIVITY]

### Launch Week
- **Day 1:** [LAUNCH DAY ACTIVITIES]
- **Day 2-3:** [FOLLOW-UP ACTIVITIES]
- **Day 4-7:** [MOMENTUM BUILDING]

### Post-Launch Phase (4-8 weeks after)
- **Week +1:** [IMMEDIATE FOLLOW-UP]
- **Week +4:** [PERFORMANCE REVIEW]
- **Week +8:** [OPTIMIZATION PHASE]

## 4. Marketing & Promotion Strategy

### Content Marketing
- **Blog Posts:** [TOPICS AND SCHEDULE]
- **Video Content:** [TYPES AND PLATFORMS]
- **Social Media:** [PLATFORM-SPECIFIC STRATEGIES]
- **Email Campaigns:** [SEQUENCE AND TIMING]

### Paid Advertising
- **Google Ads:** [KEYWORDS AND BUDGET]
- **Social Media Ads:** [PLATFORMS AND TARGETING]
- **Display Advertising:** [PLACEMENTS AND CREATIVE]

### Public Relations
- **Press Releases:** [MEDIA OUTLETS AND TIMING]
- **Influencer Partnerships:** [INFLUENCER STRATEGY]
- **Industry Events:** [CONFERENCES AND TRADE SHOWS]

### Partnerships & Collaborations
- **Strategic Partners:** [POTENTIAL PARTNERS]
- **Affiliate Programs:** [COMMISSION STRUCTURE]
- **Cross-Promotions:** [MUTUAL BENEFIT OPPORTUNITIES]

## 5. Sales Strategy

### Sales Channels
- **Direct Sales:** [WEBSITE, PHONE, IN-PERSON]
- **Retail Partners:** [DISTRIBUTION STRATEGY]
- **Online Marketplaces:** [AMAZON, ETC.]

### Sales Team Preparation
- **Training Materials:** [PRODUCT KNOWLEDGE]
- **Sales Scripts:** [KEY TALKING POINTS]
- **Objection Handling:** [COMMON CONCERNS]

### Launch Incentives
- **Early Bird Pricing:** [DISCOUNT STRATEGY]
- **Bundle Offers:** [PACKAGE DEALS]
- **Loyalty Programs:** [REPEAT CUSTOMER INCENTIVES]

## 6. Operations & Logistics

### Inventory Management
- **Stock Levels:** [INITIAL INVENTORY]
- **Supply Chain:** [SUPPLIER COORDINATION]
- **Fulfillment:** [ORDER PROCESSING]

### Customer Support
- **Support Channels:** [PHONE, EMAIL, CHAT]
- **FAQ Development:** [COMMON QUESTIONS]
- **Training:** [SUPPORT TEAM PREPARATION]

### Quality Assurance
- **Testing Protocols:** [FINAL QUALITY CHECKS]
- **Feedback Systems:** [CUSTOMER FEEDBACK COLLECTION]
- **Issue Resolution:** [PROBLEM HANDLING PROCESS]

## 7. Success Metrics & KPIs

### Launch Metrics (First 30 days)
- **Sales Volume:** [TARGET UNITS/REVENUE]
- **Website Traffic:** [VISITOR GOALS]
- **Conversion Rate:** [VISITOR TO CUSTOMER %]
- **Social Media Engagement:** [LIKES, SHARES, COMMENTS]

### Long-term Metrics (3-6 months)
- **Market Share:** [COMPETITIVE POSITION]
- **Customer Satisfaction:** [SURVEY SCORES]
- **Customer Lifetime Value:** [CLV TARGETS]
- **Return on Investment:** [ROI CALCULATIONS]

## 8. Risk Management

### Potential Risks
- **Risk 1:** [DESCRIPTION]
  - **Probability:** [HIGH/MEDIUM/LOW]
  - **Impact:** [HIGH/MEDIUM/LOW]
  - **Mitigation:** [PREVENTION STRATEGY]

### Contingency Plans
- **Scenario A:** [IF SALES ARE LOW]
- **Scenario B:** [IF DEMAND EXCEEDS SUPPLY]
- **Scenario C:** [IF COMPETITOR RESPONDS]

## 9. Budget Allocation

| Category | Budget | Percentage |
|----------|--------|-----------|
| Marketing & Advertising | $[AMOUNT] | [%] |
| Public Relations | $[AMOUNT] | [%] |
| Sales Support | $[AMOUNT] | [%] |
| Operations | $[AMOUNT] | [%] |
| Contingency | $[AMOUNT] | [%] |
| **Total** | **$[TOTAL]** | **100%** |

## 10. Next Steps & Action Items

### Immediate Actions (This Week)
- [ ] [ACTION ITEM 1]
- [ ] [ACTION ITEM 2]
- [ ] [ACTION ITEM 3]

### Short-term Goals (Next Month)
- [ ] [GOAL 1]
- [ ] [GOAL 2]
- [ ] [GOAL 3]

---

**Strategy Prepared By:** [YOUR NAME]
**Date:** [TODAY'S DATE]
**Review Date:** [NEXT REVIEW DATE]

prompts.title: Technical Documentation Writer
prompts.content:
Create comprehensive technical documentation using this structured approach:

# [PRODUCT/FEATURE NAME] Documentation

## Table of Contents
1. [Overview](#overview)
2. [Getting Started](#getting-started)
3. [Installation](#installation)
4. [Configuration](#configuration)
5. [Usage Examples](#usage-examples)
6. [API Reference](#api-reference)
7. [Troubleshooting](#troubleshooting)
8. [FAQ](#faq)
9. [Support](#support)

## Overview

### What is [PRODUCT NAME]?
[BRIEF DESCRIPTION OF THE PRODUCT/FEATURE]

### Key Features
- **Feature 1:** [DESCRIPTION AND BENEFIT]
- **Feature 2:** [DESCRIPTION AND BENEFIT]
- **Feature 3:** [DESCRIPTION AND BENEFIT]

### System Requirements
- **Operating System:** [SUPPORTED OS VERSIONS]
- **Hardware:** [MINIMUM SPECS]
- **Software Dependencies:** [REQUIRED SOFTWARE]
- **Browser Support:** [IF APPLICABLE]

### Architecture Overview
```
[ASCII DIAGRAM OR DESCRIPTION OF SYSTEM ARCHITECTURE]
```

## Getting Started

### Quick Start Guide
1. **Step 1:** [FIRST ACTION]
2. **Step 2:** [SECOND ACTION]
3. **Step 3:** [THIRD ACTION]

### Hello World Example
```[LANGUAGE]
[SIMPLE CODE EXAMPLE]
```

**Expected Output:**
```
[WHAT USERS SHOULD SEE]
```

## Installation

### Prerequisites
Before installing, ensure you have:
- [PREREQUISITE 1]
- [PREREQUISITE 2]
- [PREREQUISITE 3]

### Installation Methods

#### Method 1: Package Manager
```bash
[INSTALLATION COMMAND]
```

#### Method 2: Manual Installation
1. Download from [DOWNLOAD LINK]
2. Extract files to [DIRECTORY]
3. Run [SETUP COMMAND]

#### Method 3: Docker
```bash
docker pull [IMAGE_NAME]
docker run [RUN_COMMAND]
```

### Verification
To verify installation:
```bash
[VERIFICATION COMMAND]
```

## Configuration

### Configuration File
Create a configuration file at `[FILE_PATH]`:

```[FORMAT]
[CONFIGURATION EXAMPLE]
```

### Environment Variables
| Variable | Description | Default | Required |
|----------|-------------|---------|----------|
| `[VAR_NAME]` | [DESCRIPTION] | `[DEFAULT]` | [YES/NO] |
| `[VAR_NAME]` | [DESCRIPTION] | `[DEFAULT]` | [YES/NO] |

### Advanced Configuration
- **Security Settings:** [SECURITY OPTIONS]
- **Performance Tuning:** [OPTIMIZATION SETTINGS]
- **Logging Configuration:** [LOG SETTINGS]

## Usage Examples

### Basic Usage
```[LANGUAGE]
[BASIC EXAMPLE CODE]
```

### Advanced Usage
```[LANGUAGE]
[ADVANCED EXAMPLE CODE]
```

### Common Use Cases

#### Use Case 1: [SCENARIO NAME]
**Problem:** [WHAT USER WANTS TO ACHIEVE]
**Solution:**
```[LANGUAGE]
[SOLUTION CODE]
```

#### Use Case 2: [SCENARIO NAME]
**Problem:** [WHAT USER WANTS TO ACHIEVE]
**Solution:**
```[LANGUAGE]
[SOLUTION CODE]
```

## API Reference

### Authentication
```[LANGUAGE]
[AUTH EXAMPLE]
```

### Endpoints

#### GET /[ENDPOINT]
**Description:** [WHAT IT DOES]

**Parameters:**
- `[PARAM_NAME]` (string, required): [DESCRIPTION]
- `[PARAM_NAME]` (integer, optional): [DESCRIPTION]

**Request Example:**
```bash
curl -X GET "[API_URL]" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer [TOKEN]"
```

**Response Example:**
```json
{
  "[FIELD]": "[VALUE]",
  "[FIELD]": "[VALUE]"
}
```

#### POST /[ENDPOINT]
**Description:** [WHAT IT DOES]

**Request Body:**
```json
{
  "[FIELD]": "[VALUE]",
  "[FIELD]": "[VALUE]"
}
```

**Response:**
- **200 OK:** [SUCCESS DESCRIPTION]
- **400 Bad Request:** [ERROR DESCRIPTION]
- **401 Unauthorized:** [AUTH ERROR]

### Error Codes
| Code | Message | Description |
|------|---------|-------------|
| 400 | Bad Request | [WHEN THIS OCCURS] |
| 401 | Unauthorized | [WHEN THIS OCCURS] |
| 404 | Not Found | [WHEN THIS OCCURS] |
| 500 | Internal Server Error | [WHEN THIS OCCURS] |

## Troubleshooting

### Common Issues

#### Issue: [PROBLEM DESCRIPTION]
**Symptoms:**
- [SYMPTOM 1]
- [SYMPTOM 2]

**Causes:**
- [POSSIBLE CAUSE 1]
- [POSSIBLE CAUSE 2]

**Solutions:**
1. [SOLUTION STEP 1]
2. [SOLUTION STEP 2]
3. [SOLUTION STEP 3]

#### Issue: [PROBLEM DESCRIPTION]
**Quick Fix:**
```bash
[COMMAND TO FIX]
```

### Debug Mode
Enable debug logging:
```bash
[DEBUG COMMAND]
```

### Log Files
Check logs at:
- **Application Logs:** `[LOG_PATH]`
- **Error Logs:** `[ERROR_LOG_PATH]`
- **Access Logs:** `[ACCESS_LOG_PATH]`

## FAQ

### General Questions

**Q: [COMMON QUESTION]**
A: [DETAILED ANSWER]

**Q: [COMMON QUESTION]**
A: [DETAILED ANSWER]

### Technical Questions

**Q: [TECHNICAL QUESTION]**
A: [TECHNICAL ANSWER WITH CODE IF NEEDED]

### Performance Questions

**Q: [PERFORMANCE QUESTION]**
A: [OPTIMIZATION ADVICE]

## Support

### Getting Help
- **Documentation:** [DOCS_URL]
- **Community Forum:** [FORUM_URL]
- **GitHub Issues:** [ISSUES_URL]
- **Stack Overflow:** [TAG_NAME]

### Contact Information
- **Email:** [SUPPORT_EMAIL]
- **Chat:** [CHAT_PLATFORM]
- **Phone:** [SUPPORT_PHONE] (Business hours only)

### Contributing
We welcome contributions! Please see our [Contributing Guide](CONTRIBUTING.md) for details.

### License
This project is licensed under [LICENSE_TYPE]. See [LICENSE](LICENSE) file for details.

---

**Documentation Version:** [VERSION]
**Last Updated:** [DATE]
**Next Review:** [REVIEW_DATE]

---

*Please customize this template for your specific product/feature: [PRODUCT_NAME]*
